name: Cubanacan - Connecticut - Piramide
additionalNotes: The Cubanacan Connecticut is a mild cigar that is handmade in Nicaragua. Its light-tan Ecuadorian Connecticut Shade wrapper combines with an Ecuadorian binder and a Nicaraguan filler to deliver a smooth, creamy smoking experience that is highlighted with notes of cedar, nuts and spice. Cubanacan cigars is owned by the Mederos family, which originally started crafting premium cigars in Cuba in the early part of the 19th Century.
